org.jclouds.abiquo.monitor.internal

Class BaseVirtualMachineMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jclouds.abiquo.internal.BaseMonitoringService
      • org.jclouds.abiquo.monitor.internal.BaseVirtualMachineMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MonitoringService, VirtualMachineMonitor

    @Singleton
public class BaseVirtualMachineMonitor
extends BaseMonitoringService
implements VirtualMachineMonitor
    Default monitor for VirtualMachine objects.
    Author:
    Ignasi Barrera
